languages.text: Идира Тласс ради спасения своей проклятой души присягнула Губительным силам и позволила себе слиться с направлявшими ее долгие годы голосами. Еще много веков многоликое чудовище, в которое она со временем обратилась, вело Вольного Торговца по пути скверны нечестивыми пророчествами, изрекаемыми бесчисленными ртами. Лишь сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус мог{mf||ла} выловить единственную верную фразу из тысяч кощунств и какофонии сводящих с ума голосов.

Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.
languages.original_text: Идира Тласс ради спасения своей проклятой души присягнула Губительным силам и позволила себе слиться с направлявшими ее долгие годы голосами. Еще много веков многоликое чудовище, в которое она со временем обратилась, вело Вольного Торговца по пути скверны нечестивыми пророчествами, изрекаемыми бесчисленными ртами. Лишь сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус мог{mf||ла} выловить единственную верную фразу из тысяч кощунств и какофонии сводящих с ума голосов.

traits.locale_text: The psyker Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that directed her all those years. For many centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she turned into with time guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with her wicked prophesies, uttered by the innumerable mouths. Only the {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could catch a single truthful message from thousands of blasphemous words in the maddening cacophony of voices.

The psyker Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that directed her all those years. For many centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she turned into with time guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with her wicked prophesies, uttered by the innumerable mouths. Only the {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could catch a single truthful message from thousands of blasphemous words in the maddening cacophony of voices.

Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

languages.text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯向毁灭之力宣誓效忠，以此拯救她那可憎的灵魂。她将自己与长期指引她的那些声音融合在了一起。过了几百年之后，她最终变成了一个长着多副面孔的怪物，无数嘴巴说着邪恶的预言，在行商浪人的腐化之路上提供指引。她的声音嘈杂不谐，会让听到的人发疯，只有{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人才能从那无数的亵渎话语中破译出蕴含真理的信息。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯向毁灭之力宣誓效忠，以此拯救她那可憎的灵魂。她将自己与长期指引她的那些声音融合在了一起。过了几百年之后，她最终变成了一个长着多副面孔的怪物，无数嘴巴说着邪恶的预言，在行商浪人的腐化之路上提供指引。她的声音嘈杂不谐，会让听到的人发疯，只有{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人才能从那无数的亵渎话语中破译出蕴含真理的信息。

languages.text: Idira Tlass schwor den Mächte der Zerstörung die Treue, um ihre verdammte Seele zu retten, und gestattete sich, mit den Stimmen zu verschmelzen, die sie so lange beherrscht hatten. Das vielgesichtige Monstrum, in das sie sich schließlich verwandelte, verkündete aus seinen unzähligen Mündern über Jahrhunderte hinweg böse Prophezeiungen und führte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} so auf den Pfad der Verderbnis. Nur {name} von Valancius selbst konnte aus den tausenden von profanen Äußerungen in der wahnsinnigen Kakophonie der Stimmen eine einzige wahre Botschaft herausfiltern.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass schwor den Mächte der Zerstörung die Treue, um ihre verdammte Seele zu retten, und gestattete sich, mit den Stimmen zu verschmelzen, die sie so lange beherrscht hatten. Das vielgesichtige Monstrum, in das sie sich schließlich verwandelte, verkündete aus seinen unzähligen Mündern über Jahrhunderte hinweg böse Prophezeiungen und führte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} so auf den Pfad der Verderbnis. Nur {name} von Valancius selbst konnte aus den tausenden von profanen Äußerungen in der wahnsinnigen Kakophonie der Stimmen eine einzige wahre Botschaft herausfiltern.

languages.text: Idira Tlass jura allégeance aux Puissances de la Ruine dans une tentative désespérée de sauver son âme damnée. Elle se livra ainsi totalement aux voix qui s'efforçaient de s'emparer de son esprit depuis si longtemps. Durant des siècles, la monstruosité aux multiples visages qu'elle était devenue guida {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur la voie de la corruption grâce à ses prophéties énoncées par ses innombrables bouches. {mf|Seul|Seule} {name} von Valancius était en mesure de déchiffrer le véritable sens des paroles profanes qui s'élevaient de ses milliers d'orifices en une immonde cacophonie.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass jura allégeance aux Puissances de la Ruine dans une tentative désespérée de sauver son âme damnée. Elle se livra ainsi totalement aux voix qui s'efforçaient de s'emparer de son esprit depuis si longtemps. Durant des siècles, la monstruosité aux multiples visages qu'elle était devenue guida {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur la voie de la corruption grâce à ses prophéties énoncées par ses innombrables bouches. {mf|Seul|Seule} {name} von Valancius était en mesure de déchiffrer le véritable sens des paroles profanes qui s'élevaient de ses milliers d'orifices en une immonde cacophonie.

languages.text: Idira Tlass juró lealtad a los Poderes Ruinosos para salvar su alma condenada y se dejó fundir con las voces que durante tanto tiempo la habían guiado. Durante siglos, la monstruosidad de cientos de rostros en la que se acabó convirtiendo guio a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en la senda de la corrupción con profecías malévolas que revelaba con sus innumerables bocas. {name} von Valancius era la única persona capaz de discernir sus verdaderos mensajes en la cacofonía delirante de sus miles de frases profanas.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass juró lealtad a los Poderes Ruinosos para salvar su alma condenada y se dejó fundir con las voces que durante tanto tiempo la habían guiado. Durante siglos, la monstruosidad de cientos de rostros en la que se acabó convirtiendo guio a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en la senda de la corrupción con profecías malévolas que revelaba con sus innumerables bocas. {name} von Valancius era la única persona capaz de discernir sus verdaderos mensajes en la cacofonía delirante de sus miles de frases profanas.

languages.text: イディラ・タラースは自らの呪われた魂を救うため、〈禍つ神々〉に忠誠を誓った。そうすることで、長く彼女を導いてきた声と一体になれたのだ。イディラは最終的に多頭の怪物に姿を変え、無数の口から放たれる悪戯な予言によって、穢れの道を往くローグトレーダーを数世紀も導いた。不協和音を奏でる狂わしい声のうち、幾千もの邪な言葉から、真実の伝言（ことづて）をひとつでも解読できたのは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスその人だけだった。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: イディラ・タラースは自らの呪われた魂を救うため、〈禍つ神々〉に忠誠を誓った。そうすることで、長く彼女を導いてきた声と一体になれたのだ。イディラは最終的に多頭の怪物に姿を変え、無数の口から放たれる悪戯な予言によって、穢れの道を往くローグトレーダーを数世紀も導いた。不協和音を奏でる狂わしい声のうち、幾千もの邪な言葉から、真実の伝言（ことづて）をひとつでも解読できたのは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスその人だけだった。

languages.text: İdira Tlass, lanetli ruhunu kurtarmak için Yıkıcı Güçler'e sadakat yemini etti ve onu uzunca bir süredir yönlendiren seslerle bütün oldu. Zaman içinde dönüştüğü çok yüzlü canavar, sayısız ağzıyla sarf ettiği habis kehânetlerle, Hür Tacir'i yüzyıllar boyunca yozlaşmanın yolunda yürüttü. Binlerce uğursuz sözün meydana getirdiği delirtici ses kakofonisinden anlamlı bir mesaj çıkarabilmeyi tek başarabilen kişi {name} von Valancius'un kendisiydi.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass pledged her loyalty to the Ruinous Powers to save her damned soul and allowed herself to merge with the voices that had been directing her for so long. For centuries, the many-faced monstrosity she eventually turned into guided the Rogue Trader on the path of corruption with wicked prophecies spoken by its innumerable mouths. Only {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self could decipher a single truthful message from the thousands of profane utterances in the maddening cacophony of voices.

traits.locale_text: İdira Tlass, lanetli ruhunu kurtarmak için Yıkıcı Güçlere sadakat yemini etti ve onu uzunca bir süredir yönlendiren seslerle bütün oldu. Zaman içinde dönüştüğü çok yüzlü canavar, sayısız ağzıyla sarf ettiği habis kehânetlerle, Hür Tacir'i yüzyıllar boyunca yozlaşmanın yolunda yürüttü. Binlerce uğursuz sözün meydana getirdiği delirtici ses kakofonisinden anlamlı bir mesaj çıkarabilmeyi tek başarabilen kişi {name} von Valancius'un kendisiydi.
